thread.title: Travel Agent Academy Launches Palladium Pro Specialist Program
thread.title_full: Travel Agent Academy Launches Palladium Pro Specialist Program

title: Travel Agent Academy Launches Palladium Pro Specialist Program
text:
Last updated: 04:06 PM ET, Thu September 03 2015 Travel Agent Academy Launches Palladium Pro Specialist Program Travel Agent | Palladium Hotel Group | Courtney Love | September 03, 2015 
Travel Agent Academy, in conjunction with Palladium Hotel Resorts , is excited to announce the launch of its new Palladium Pro Specialist Program. Celebrating its 50th Anniversary in the hospitality industry, the Palladium Hotel Group has renewed its commitment to constant innovation and a redefinition of its lifestyle brands. Palladium also continues to honor its treasured partnership with travel agents. 
Palladium Connect, the brand’s robust travel agent portal with a myriad of resources, houses their education program where you can become a Palladium Pro Specialist. This program will introduce you to the Palladium Hotel Group where you’ll learn the heartbeat of their portfolio of brands. You’ll discover the amazing amenities and experiences enjoyed at their all-inclusive brands, dive into their five-star beachfront properties and discover luxury at their adults-only all-inclusive concept.
